long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make Data Driven Instagram Posts Scheduling!

Timical is FREE Chrome extension that scrapes the current open user Instagram posts tab data and analysis it to predict the best time slots to post on Instagram to achieve maximum followers engagement by utilizing advanced AI technology.

After installing the extension login into your Instagram account (even if you would like to check other Instagram profile you must login first otherwise it won‚Äôt work), go to the posts tab page and open the popup window to see the best time to post analytics and heat-map.

Why Timical.

When it comes to promoting your brand or selling products on Instagram, optimal timing is essential!

Every successful brand on Instagram, have a data-driven schedule determining the best day and time to post. Even the most stunning Instagram posts won't do your business any good if you don't publish it at the right time. Publishing during high-traffic times maximizes the odds of catching your audience's fragile attention.
